titleStmt.title: Letters of love and gallantry, and several other subjects. Vol. II written by ladies ; with a dialogue between love and reason, shewing, the reasonableness and unreasonableness of love, the nun's letter to the monk, characters and pictures of several ladies and gentlemen, with other passionate letters that passed betwixt both sexes, in town and country.

Letters of love and gallantry, and several other subjects. Vol. II written by ladies ; with a dialogue between love and reason, shewing, the reasonableness and unreasonableness of love, the nun's letter to the monk, characters and pictures of several ladies and gentlemen, with other passionate letters that passed betwixt both sexes, in town and country.

notesStmt.note: Advertisement: prelim. p. [1] and p. [1]-[3] at end.
"Advertisement. Letters of love and gallantry, and several other subjects, all written by ladies : with the memoirs, life and adventures of a young lady; written by herself. Vol. I": prelim. p. [1].
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
